other_tests.findings: Extensive piecemeal necrosis consistent with chronic hepatitis, confirming the diagnosis of cirrhosis.
Failed to show any macroscopic anatomic shunt-producing lesions.
Revealed the presence of an extracardiac shunt.

other_tests.procedure_name: Lung Scanning with Technetium Tc 99m Macroaggregated Albumin
other_tests.findings: Showed increased uptake in the brain, salivary glands, thyroid, the enlarged spleen, kidneys, and intestines, confirming the presence of a pulmonary shunt.
